resources.string: Without the permission for the location and access to body sensors the app will be unable to connect to Google Fit.
You need to log into a Google account to use this app. It depends on the fitness store from the Google Fit API.
Select ♂ if you have a lot of testosterone. Select ♀ if you are more the estrogen type.
This app uses your birthdate to calculate your age. The age is needed because the body fat ratio changes while aging.
Error: The entered value needs to be a number.
Enter the measurement as a decimal number.

Reset the slider at the scale to maximum. Pinch a fold of you skin between thumb and index finger. Place the caliper over the fold while still holding it. Press the caliper with two fingers of your second hand at the raised positions. You may release the fold with your first hand after the caliper maintains its shape. Increase the pressure until the caliper clicks into the catch. Release the caliper and read the measurement fron the scale.
